description: Two anthropomorphic ants on a floor confront an approaching vacuum cleaner. One ant, wearing a small shirt, looks up in terror at the large machine. The other ant, lying prone, appears already affected or resigned to its fate. The ants perceive the vacuum cleaner as a terrifying, inescapable cosmic event, specifically a "black hole." This highlights the absurd and surreal difference in scale between human and insect existence and the potential for mundane objects to become existential threats depending on one's perspective.
caption: “Look out! ... It’s a black hole!”
